channel.title: Chapter 16: Regularization on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)
channel.description: Recent content in Chapter 16: Regularization on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)

item.title: Chapter 16.01: Introduction to Regularization
item.description: In this section, we revisit overfitting and introduce regularization as a remedy.

item.title: Chapter 16.02: Lasso and Ridge Regression
item.description: We introduce Lasso and Ridge regression as the key approaches to regularizing linear models.

item.title: Chapter 16.03: Lasso vs Ridge Regression
item.description: This section provides a detailed comparison between Lasso and Ridge regression.

item.title: Chapter 16.04: Elastic Net and Regularization for GLMs
item.description: In this section, we introduce the elastic net as a combination of Ridge and Lasso regression and discuss regularization for logistic regression.

item.title: Chapter 16.05: Regularization for Underdetermined Problems
item.description: In this section, we discuss how regularization can make ill-posed problems well-defined.

item.title: Chapter 16.06: L0 Regularization
item.description: In this section, we introduce \(LQ\) regularization and particularly discuss \(L0\) regularization as an important special case besides \(L1\) and \(L2\) that penalizes the number of non-zero parameters.

item.title: Chapter 16.07: Regularization in NonLinear Models and Bayesian Priors
item.description: In this section, we motivate regularization from a Bayesian perspective, showing how different penalty terms correspond to different Bayesian priors.

item.title: Chapter 16.08: Geometric Analysis of L2 Regularization and Weight Decay
item.description: In this section, we provide a geometric understanding of \(L2\) regularization, showing how parameters are shrunk according to the eigenvalues of the Hessian of empirical risk, and discuss its correspondence to weight decay.

item.title: Chapter 16.09: Geometric Analysis of L1 Regularization
item.description: In this section, we provide a geometric understanding of \(L1\) regularization and show that it encourages sparsity in the parameter vector.

item.title: Chapter 16.10: Early Stopping
item.description: In this section, we introduce early stopping and show how it can act as a regularizer.
